name: SWORD1
description:
Overview

SWORD1 is an action combat game where you fight for your life in gladiator like battles on an always shrinking platform high in the air.

Ludum Dare

This game was developed over the course of 48h in LuduDare42 Compo mode. The theme of this event was "Running out of space".

Have fun!

Developer

Lawrence Lazauskas  |  @lawrence_laz
